resources.string: The beat track shows you when to tap the screen. A successful tap is when the beat is in the middle of the double horizontal lines.
Tap on the field, not the beat track, to create a unit where you tapped.
When a long beat is the current beat, you can drag your finger across the field to create a wall.

Your base is at the bottom of the screen. Your opponent\'s base is at the top. Each base has a health. You win when your opponent\'s health reaches 0 or if your health is higher at the end of the song.
